import React, { useState } from "react"; import { MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBIcon, MDBInputGroup, MDBRadio, MDBRow, MDBTypography, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; export default function WeatherApp() { const [search, setSearch] = useState return (
Check the weather forecast Search

Humidity: 80%

Direction: North

); }
